revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Lucent |model=RG-1000 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price=230 |est_release_date=07/2000 |fcc_date=07/20/1999 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=IMRWLPCE24H |ic_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1.1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=AMD |cpu1_model=ElanSC400-33AC |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=0.5 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=4 |ram1_brand=Vanguard |ram1_model=VG26V18165CJ-6 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=ORiNOCO PC Card |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Lucent |wi1_chip1_model=HERMES I |wi1_chip2_brand=Lucent |wi1_chip2_model=THESEUS HS |wi1_chip3_brand=Philips |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=MC |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=AMD |eth_chip1_model=Am79C961AKC |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=modem |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^[a-f0-9]{6}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:02:2D |oui_eth=00:60:1D }} The hardware appears near identical to the [[Apple AirPort Base Station M5757 (Graphite)]]. There is no FCC ID printed on the external label of the unit. [http://www.seattlewireless.net/OrinocoRg1000 On SeattleWireless] :[http://www.seattlewireless.net/OrinocoRg1000Pictures Pictures of the unit on SeattleWireless] [http://www.murgatroid.com/rg1000/rg1000.htm Pictures and info]
[http://www.plasma-online.de/english/upgrade/tweak/fixes/fix_apple_airport.html On Plasma-Online]
[https://personaltelco.net/wiki/Rg1000Comments On personaltelco.net] The product price is per [http://www.practicallynetworked.com/item.asp?pid=358 Practically Networked]. The default SSID appears to be the last three octets of the WLAN card MAC address (lower case letters). The included power supply is a '''AK II Technology''' A10D2-09MP (9V, 1.1A).
